About The Founder

  1. Home
  2. About The Founder

About Us

Welcome to Gum & Gums! My name is Hassan Kashif and I am the founder of this company. I am passionate about oral hygiene and believe that everyone should have access to high-quality products. That's why I invented Dr. Floss – to provide a convenient and effective way for people to floss daily.

Since the early days of Gum & Gums, we have been fortunate enough to win multiple local and state pitch competitions and have formed affiliations with many prestigious organizations and dental schools that would like to collaborate on producing white papers on Dr. Floss. Through customer discovery, we have received overwhelmingly positive feedback from customers and dental professionals alike.

I have always been interested in oral care and spent my time at Montclair State University developing Dr. Floss. My background as a biology undergraduate and Master in Business Administration has allowed me to bring a unique perspective to the development of Dr. Floss, and I am constantly striving to improve and innovate.

I am proud of what we have accomplished at Gum & Gums and am excited to continue growing and providing top-notch products to our customers. Thank you for choosing us, and I hope that you will have a great experience with our innovative products.

Accolades & Affiliations

Global Product Developement Partners

Gum and Gums originated from modest beginnings, but our drive and will to achieve positive change have allowed us to grow into the successful Online Sustainable Product Store we are today. It’s not just about offering environmentally friendly and socially responsible products, we strive to inform and inspire the global community to embrace a sustainable lifestyle.
